features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Powerful Features for Seamless Label Printing
features.description: Discover how ModernPrice revolutionizes your labeling process with intuitive, cross-platform capabilitiesâ€”no internet or drivers needed.
features.astro: No need for a constant internet connection. ModernPrice works seamlessly offline, so you can print labels anytime, anywhere.
features.alpine: Input the cash price, and let ModernPrice automatically calculate the card price for you. It's efficient pricing made simple.
features.tailwind: Choose from three different label sizes to fit your specific needs. ModernPrice gives you the flexibility to adapt to various pricing scenarios.
features.localization: Eliminate the hassle of downloading additional Zebra drivers or software. ModernPrice is plug-and-play, right out of the box.
features.light_dark_mode: Whether you're on Windows, macOS, or Linux, ModernPrice has you covered. Experience streamlined label printing across all operating systems.
features.giscus: Optimize your workflow by setting the number of labels you want to print in a single batch.
features.decapcms: Open source content management for your Git workflow
features.articlegenerator: Use AI to generate your articles posts
